cast.name: 瓦尔德马·雅努茨扎克 Waldemar Januszczak

this_title: Manet: The Man Who Invented Modern Art
introduction: Manet is one of the main candidates for the title of the most important artist there has been. As the reluctant father of Impressionism, and the painter of Dejeuner sur l'herbe, he can probably be accused of inventing modern art. But his story is fascinating on many other levels.As a piece of compelling biography, Manet's is the unlikely tale of the stubborn son of the most hi...
foreign_title: Manet: The Man Who Invented Modern Art
